feature_description_two.message: 在任何电子设备上极速提供开箱即用的游戏开发环境。

feature_description_three.message: 提供多元的编程语言支持，满足你多样的编程口味！

engine_feature_title_code_editor.description: The engine feature title Powerful Code Editor in front page

engine_feature_description_code_editor.message: Dora SSR 的 Web IDE 提供了多种编程语言和文件类型的支持，具备语法高亮、自动补全和文档跳转等功能，让开发更加高效和便捷。
engine_feature_description_code_editor.description: The engine feature description Powerful Code Editor in front page

engine_feature_title_yarn_spinner_editor.description: The engine feature description Intuitive Yarn Spinner Script Editor in front page

engine_feature_description_yarn_spinner_.message: 集成的 Yarn Spinner 剧本编辑器提供了直观的故事编写工具，通过可视化节点图和简单标签实现复杂的剧情设计和管理。
engine_feature_description_yarn_spinner_.description: The engine feature description Intuitive Yarn Spinner Script Editor

engine_feature_title_visual_script_edito.description: The engine feature title Visual Script Editor in front page

engine_feature_description_visual_script.message: 提供简单易上手的可视化脚本编辑器，通过图形化编程方式降低编程门槛，帮助培养逻辑思维和问题解决能力。
engine_feature_description_visual_script.description: The engine feature description Visual Script Editor in front page

engine_feature_title_skeletal_animation.description: The engine feature title Skeletal Animation Support in front page

engine_feature_description_skeletal_anim.message: 内置 2D 骨骼动画的支持包括 Spine2D、DragonBones 以及一套自己实现的2D骨骼动画系统。集成了 Spine2D 预览功能，可以切换预览皮肤和进行动画播放。
engine_feature_description_skeletal_anim.description: The engine feature description Skeletal Animation Support in front page

engine_feature_title_tiled_map.description: The engine feature title Tiled Map Rendering Support in front page

engine_feature_description_tiled_map.message: Dora SSR 支持由 Tiled Map Editor 制作的瓦片地图。通过简单的配置和加载，开发者可以在引擎中轻松渲染复杂的瓦片地图，实现丰富的游戏场景设计和精确的地形展示。
engine_feature_description_tiled_map.description: The engine feature description Tiled Map Rendering Support in front page

engine_feature_platformer_game_support.description: The engine feature title Platformer Game Support in front page

engine_feature_description_platformer_ga.message: Dora SSR 提供专门为平台游戏开发设计的功能模块，包括物理引擎、碰撞检测和动画系统等，使开发者能够轻松创建流畅且富有表现力的平台游戏。
engine_feature_description_platformer_ga.description: The engine feature description Platformer Game Support in front page

engine_feature_ml_and_ai_framework.message: 内置机器学习和 AI 开发框架
engine_feature_ml_and_ai_framework.description: The engine feature title Built-in ML and AI Framework in front page

engine_feature_description_ml_and_ai_fra.message: Dora SSR 提供内置的机器学习算法框架和 AI 开发框架，帮助开发者在游戏中轻松实现智能化行为和高级数据处理，使游戏更加智能和互动。
engine_feature_description_ml_and_ai_fra.description: The engine feature description Built-in ML and AI Framework in front page

engine_feature_open_art_assets_and_game_.message: 开放美术素材和游戏 IP
engine_feature_open_art_assets_and_game_.description: The engine feature title Open Art Assets and Game IP in front page

engine_feature_description_open_art_asse.message: Dora SSR 提供可用于制作自己游戏的开放美术素材和游戏 IP——《灵数奇缘》。开发者可以自由使用这些资源进行创作，快速构建出色的游戏体验。
engine_feature_description_open_art_asse.description: The engine feature description Open Art Assets and Game IP in front page

engine_feature_lua_scripting_support.description: The engine feature title Lua Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_lua_scripting.message: Dora SSR 提供升级的 Lua 绑定，支持继承和扩展底层 C++ 对象。
engine_feature_description_lua_scripting.description: The engine feature description Lua Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_yuescript_scripting_suppo.description: The engine feature title YueScript Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_yuescript_scr.message: Dora SSR 支持使用 YueScript 语言，一门强表达力且简洁的 Lua 方言，作为脚本语言开发游戏。
engine_feature_description_yuescript_scr.description: The engine feature description YueScript Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_teal_scripting_support.description: The engine feature title Teal Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_teal_scriptin.message: Dora SSR 支持使用 Teal 语言，一门编译到 Lua 的静态类型语言，作为脚本语言开发游戏。
engine_feature_description_teal_scriptin.description: The engine feature description Teal Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_typescript_scripting_supp.description: The engine feature title TypeScript Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_typescript_sc.message: Dora SSR 支持 TypeScript 作为脚本开发语言，这是一种 JavaScript 的静态类型超集，增加了强大的类型检查功能，并允许在脚本中嵌入类似 XML/HTML 的 TSX 文本，提升了代码的可靠性和编写体验。
engine_feature_description_typescript_sc.description: The engine feature description TypeScript Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_rust_scripting_support.description: The engine feature title Rust Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_rust_scriptin.message: Dora SSR 支持 Rust 作为脚本开发语言，运行在内置的 WASM 绑定和 VM 上，提供高性能和安全性的编程体验，适用于对性能要求高的游戏开发场景。
engine_feature_description_rust_scriptin.description: The engine feature description Rust Scripting Support in front page

promotion_section_title.description: The promotion section title in front page

feature_section_title.description: The feature section title in front page

engine_feature_title_cross_platform_game.description: The engine feature title Cross-Platform Game Dev Support in front page

engine_feature_description_cross_platfor.message: Dora SSR 支持在手机、开源掌机等设备上直接进行游戏开发，兼容 Windows、Linux、iOS、macOS 和 Android 等多平台，使开发者能够随时随地进行创作。
engine_feature_description_cross_platfor.description: The engine feature description Cross-Platform Game Dev Support in front page

engine_feature_profiling_and_debugging_t.message: 实用的性能分析与调试工具
engine_feature_profiling_and_debugging_t.description: The engine feature title Profiling and Debugging Tools in front page

engine_feature_description_profiling_and.message: Dora SSR Web IDE 提供了实用的性能分析和调试工具，允许开发者实时监控 CPU 和 GPU 的使用情况，分析内存占用，并细致地跟踪脚本执行时间和各个模块的性能瓶颈，帮助优化游戏性能。
engine_feature_description_profiling_and.description: The engine feature description Profiling and Debugging Tools in front page

theme.blog.author.pageTitle.description: The title of the page for a blog author

theme.blog.authorsList.pageTitle.description: The title of the authors page

theme.blog.authorsList.viewAll.description: The label of the link targeting the blog authors page

theme.contentVisibility.unlistedBanner.m.message: 此页面未列出。搜索引擎不会对其索引，只有拥有直接链接的用户才能访问。

theme.contentVisibility.draftBanner.mess.message: 此页面是草稿。它仅在开发环境中可见，并将在生产构建中被排除。

theme.blog.author.noPosts.message: 此作者尚未发表任何博文。
theme.blog.author.noPosts.description: The text for authors with 0 blog post

engine_feature_wa_scripting_support.description: The engine feature title Wa Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_description_wa_scripting_.message: Dora SSR 支持凹语言，一门简单、可靠且静态类型的语言，运行在内置的 WASM 绑定和 VM 上。适合作为便捷易上手的高性能 WASM 语言开发游戏。
engine_feature_description_wa_scripting_.description: The engine feature description Wa Scripting Support in front page

engine_feature_title_blockly.description: The engine feature title Blockly Scripting in front page

engine_feature_description_blockly.message: 积木脚本系统通过可视化、拼图式的代码块，让用户可以轻松创建复杂的游戏行为，无需通过文本输入编写代码。
engine_feature_description_blockly.description: The engine feature description Blockly Scripting for Beginners in front page
